pr_title: Change deprecation indexing to use a custom template

timeline.message: Change deprecation indexing to use its own templates, not the stack ones
Mark the deprecation logs data stream as hidden

timeline.bodyText: This should not be overridden to true, since in a rolling environment a 7.11 node could start logging deprecation messages that are indexed prior to the master node being upgraded (meaning that the templates would not be in place), so the messages could end up not being indexed correctly
timeline.author: dakrone
